function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of accurate pandemic data collection","Impact":"Ineffective disease control and response","Mitigation":"Implementation of standardized data collection protocols and training of healthcare workers","Technologies":"Digital data collection tools, data validation algorithms","People":"Healthcare workers, data scientists, government health agencies","Owner":"Government health agencies"},{"Description":"Reliability and scalability issues in pandemic data modeling","Impact":"Inaccurate predictions and decision-making","Mitigation":"Use of advanced computational models and software tools, optimization of data processing algorithms","Technologies":"High-performance computing, cloud computing, machine learning algorithms","People":"Data scientists, computational modelers, software developers","Owner":"Research institutions, technology companies"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of ontology-based COVID-19 data","Impact":"Erroneous decision-making and reasoning about COVID-19 data","Mitigation":"Validation of ontology structures by domain experts, peer review of ontology models","Technologies":"Ontology validation tools, peer review platforms","People":"Domain experts, data scientists, ontology experts","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations"}]}
